channel.title: HMM on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in HMM on Inductive Bias

item.title: Video: Max Heimel on sequence tagging w/ Apache Mahout
item.description: Video: Max Heimel on sequence tagging w/ Apache Mahout # Some time ago Max Heimel from TU Berlin gave presentation of the new HMM support in the Mahout 0.4 release at the Apache Hadoop Get Together in Berlin: Mahout Max Heimel from Isabel Drost on Vimeo. Thanks to JTeam for sponsoring video taping, thanks to newthinking for providing the location and thanks to Martin Schmidt from newthinking for producing the video.
